org.apache.tephra.metrics

Interface MetricsCollector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMetricsCollector, TxMetricsCollector

    public interface MetricsCollector
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    Basic API for Tephra to support system metrics.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.State

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Called before the collector service is started, allowing the collector to setup any required configuration.
      void gauge(String metricName, int value, String... tags)
      Report a metric as an absolute value.
      void histogram(String metricName, int value)
      Report a metric calculating the distribution of the value.
      void rate(String metricName)
      Report a metric as a count over a given time duration.
      void rate(String metricName, int count)
      Report a metric as a count over a given time duration.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        addListener, isRunning, start, startAndWait, state, stop, stopAndWait

    • Method Detail

      • gauge

        void gauge(String metricName,
         int value,
         String... tags)
        Report a metric as an absolute value.

      • rate

        void rate(String metricName)
        Report a metric as a count over a given time duration. This method uses an implicit count of 1.

      • rate

        void rate(String metricName,
        int count)
        Report a metric as a count over a given time duration.

      • histogram

        void histogram(String metricName,
             int value)
        Report a metric calculating the distribution of the value.

      • configure

        void configure(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
        Called before the collector service is started, allowing the collector to setup any required configuration.
